"The Bridge":
"The \"Bridge\" is the central location for the story of \"EPISODE 4\".

You can begin Story Quests from this location by speaking to Xiera.

You can move to the Bridge quickly and easily by using the \"Quick Menu\"."

"The Quick Menu is a menu that gives you convenient access to a number of functions, simply by pressing <%SelectMenu>.

Use the Quick Menu to easily access functions such as viewing information on nearby characters and moving to specific areas without having to use a Teleporter."
